page.title: 05Home Life in Hellesdon
page.content: My family are all up by about 9.00am and dad cooks the breakfast using the gas hob.It is usually sausage,egg and fried bread for breakfast.Through the day my dad may do some gardening or mow the lawn with our mower that you can sit on.Mum might do some washing in our washing machine.Dinner is about 1.00pm and is usually sandwiches.I may have corned beef or ham.Later we might watch our tele or maybe hire a film for our video recorder.Later on we all usually troop down to the river to our tennis court and play a game.After, we go to the chinese take away and have a meal,I usually have duck and mushrooms in sauce.Later we watch T.V.again and we feed our cat.At about 10.45pm I go to bed and listen to my radio until about 11.00pm when I fall asleep.
